trans-unit.source: Specifies the case of characters typed manually into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> 控制項中手動輸入之字元的大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The value of this enumeration does not affect characters that are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉值不會影響字元加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to convert all characters to uppercase that are manually entered into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>屬性，將所有字元都轉換成大寫，手動輸入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Characters typed into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> are converted to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> 中所輸入的字元轉換成小寫。

trans-unit.source: Characters typed into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> are not converted.
trans-unit.target: 不轉換 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> 中所輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: Characters typed into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> are converted to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" /> 中輸入的字元轉換成大寫。
